name: Playing Dave!
description:
STORY

Playing Dave! is a hilarious narrative and mini platform game where you play Anthony, a sound designer, that has to cover his friend by doing his job as a game developer.

Anthony will have to apply all his knowledge in video games to impersonate his friends job, in order to DELAY THE INEVITABLE: Dave’s dismissal.

FEATURES
  • Hilarious narrative among two friends
  • Mini platform games that will make your experience fun
  • Cats, who doesn’t like cats in games?
  • No programmer made this game, because of “COVID”.
THE TEAM
  • Ayose Trujillo: Game designer, pixel art and developer
  • Antonio Vozmediano: sound and SFX designer
  • Beatriz Díaz: Storytelling and scripts

ES - Spanish Location:

El día que fuí Dave

https://makingenemies.itch.io/playing-dave-spanish
